title: Create minimal backend setup (AI-first)
description:
Create MINIMAL directory structure and config for AI-first validation.

## AI-First Scope (reduced from original)
Only create what's needed to run agents with mock data:

```
backend/
├── pyproject.toml          # Minimal deps: google-adk, pydantic
├── config/
│   ├── __init__.py
│   └── settings.py         # AI_PROVIDER, model config only
├── models/
│   ├── __init__.py
│   ├── analyze_agent.py    # First agent
│   └── recommend_agent.py  # Second agent
├── helpers/
│   ├── __init__.py
│   └── tools.py            # Mock data tool only
tests/
└── fixtures/               # Mock data JSON files
```

## Deferred to Later
- Full route structure (HALO-5)
- Controllers (after agents validated)
- Session management (after routes)
- Auth routes (after basic flow works)

## pyproject.toml (minimal)
```toml
[project]
name = "agatha-backend"
version = "0.1.0"
dependencies = [
    "google-adk>=0.1.0",
    "pydantic>=2.0",
]

[project.optional-dependencies]
dev = ["pytest", "pytest-asyncio"]
```
